My Books List

Last update: 04-04-2015.

I believe that you can learn all you want in internet. However, there are situation in which a good book can help you to learn in deep about something or to begin to learn about it.

In any case, here is the book list with my favorite books or with ones I really want to read when I have time. I hope that you enjoy it!

I’ll try to update this list when I have more time with more books and summaries about why they are interesting.

Labels: to read beginner advanced expert

Software Engineering

  • to readDesign Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
  • beginnerClean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
  • advancedPragmatic programmer: from journeyman to master

Machine Learning

  • beginnerProgramming Collective Intelligence: Building Smart Web 2.0 Applications
  • to readMachine Learning for Hackers: Case Studies and Algorithms to Get You Started
  • to readMachine Learning: An Algorithmic Perspective
  • to readIntroduction to Machine Learning
  • to readThe Elements of Statistical Learning: Data Mining, Inference, and Prediction

Languages

Python:

  • beginnerPython for Kids: A Playful Introduction to Programming
  • to readNatural Language Processing with Python
  • to readHigh Performance Python: Practical Performant Programming for Humans

Go:

  • beginnerAn introduction to programming in Go

Javascript:

  • beginnerSpeaking JavaScript: An In-Depth Guide for Programmers

HTML/CSS:

  • beginnerHTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites
